background_color.description: Email-template only alias for the background color defined in Content Settings > Colors and Fonts

body_border_color.description: Email-template only alias for the border color defined in Content Settings > Colors and Fonts

body_border_color_choice.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.body_border_color_choice` The variable is used in HubSpot's default email templates to determine whether or not a border should be added. The setting is controlled in Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. It prints values: BORDER_AUTOMATIC, BORDER_MANUAL, BORDER_NONE

body_color.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.body_color` Body color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

content.create_page.description: This variable is True, if there is a web page version of the email.

content.email_body.description: The main body of the email. This variable renders a rich text module.

content.emailbody_plaintext.description: The optional override of the plain text email body.

content.from_name.description: The from name of the email sender.

content.reply_to.description: The reply to address for the email.

email_body_border_css.description: Email-template only alias which generates the css styles for the email border based on content settings email settings.

email_body_padding.description: The email body padding setting. This setting is located in Content Settings > Email.

email_body_width.description: The email body width setting. This setting is located in Content Settings > Email..

primary_accent_color.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.primary_accent_color` Primary accent color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

primary_font.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.primary_font`. Primary font setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts.

primary_font_size.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.primary_font_size`. Primary font size setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Includes 'px'.

primary_font_size_num.description: Prints the font size number from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Excludes 'px'.

secondary_accent_color.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.secondary_accent_color ` Secondary accent color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

secondary_font.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.secondary_font ` Secondary font setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts.

secondary_font_color.description: Email-template only alias for `site_settings.secondary_font_color ` Secondary accent color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

secondary_font_size_num.description: Prints the font size number from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Excludes 'px'.

site_settings.company_street_address_2.description: Prints the address line 2 from Content Settings > Email > Footer Information.

site_settings.office_location_name.description: Prints the office location name from Content Settings > Email > Footer Information.

subscription_confirmation_url.description: Prints the URL of the subscription preferences confirmation page. This URL is dynamically generated on send.
